name: Super Mario World Almost Remastered
description:
WOW! This is the game that's called Super Mario World Almost Remastered. This is my mod for Mario Mania. This is my own mod for Mario Mania. This is my mod from Mario Mania. This is my own mod from Mario Mania.

Mod for Mario Mania is made by me (MajorGeniePonyGirl) and sonicmaniamaster99
